original_text: Then the altar broke into two pieces and the ashes fell to the ground. That is what God's servant had said would happen, to show that he spoke with the Lord's authority.
korean_text: 하나님의 사람이 여호와의 말씀으로 보인 징조대로 제단이 갈라지며 재가 제단에서 쏟아진지라

sentences.original_text: Then the altar broke into two pieces
and the ashes fell to the ground.
That is what God's servant had said would happen,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님의 종이 일어날 것이라고 말했던 것입니다,

sentences.original_text: to show that he spoke with the Lord's authority.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 주님의 권위로 말했음을 보여주기 위함입니다.
